Dependences:
   - Lombok
   - Jedis
   - Raauhh's PaperSpigot fork

   - dmulloy2's 1.7.10 ProtocolLib
       * https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/

   - Brettflan's 1.7.10 WorldBorder
       * https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/worldborder

   - inventivetalent's Hologram API
       * https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/api-hologramapi-1-7-1-8-1-9-1-10.6766/
	 
# Using RSpigot you can configure your knockback values at paper.yml
